thread.title: Fishing Line for Oct. 3, 2024 | Lifestyle | abqjournal.com
thread.title_full: Fishing Line for Oct. 3, 2024 | Lifestyle | abqjournal.com

author: New Mexico Department of Game and Fish
title: Fishing Line for Oct. 3, 2024 | Lifestyle | abqjournal.com
text:
CATCHES OF THE WEEK On the Pecos River, Robert Montoya of Santa Fe caught and released a 28-inch brown trout using a size-16, pheasant tail Warrior Fly on Sept. 26. … Donald Gutierrez of Albuquerque and his grandson Damian caught a 23-inch, 4.5-pound rainbow trout using a worm with salmon eggs on Sept. 24.
